title: Perera and Sons celebrates International Women’s Day honouring the dynamic female workforce
body_lines: Perera and Sons conducted a special event this year on International Women’s Day honouring the dynamic female workforce that contributes to the organisation’s success. Joining the international theme #breakthebais, the event was held on the 8 March at the head office premises in keeping with all the concerning COVID-19 health guidelines.Perera and Sons felicitate its female workforce each year with tokens of appreciation and celebrate their milestones and success stories. Every female employee has immensely contributed to the growth and achievements throughout the years.

The food confectionary establishment believes in appreciating its workforce that supports Perera and Sons throughout its thriving years in the business. Over the years Perera and Sons dedicated themselves to serving the finest food to the nation, being one of the most sought caterers that indulge the traditional flavours.
